channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
Ok guys I just found out today something very bizarre, these people in my school are perverted.
Look, I got the notes from off the floor that my girlfriend dropped. (They were assigned to her)
[quote="Luke"]hi. you dumped me before but i was thinkin we could get back together and get [b]to fourth base[/b] i love y luke[/quote]
Mannn...wait til I find him.
[quote="cody a"]hi i miss you. you dumped me after like 2 days and i love you! lovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelove lovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelove lovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelove lovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelove lovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelove
so whats your answer? cody a[/quote]
fucker...
[quote="adam c"]hiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii i luv u so much and i want to get back together witout u i will lose my manliness and i was thinkin we could take our relationship...to bed? respond. adam[/quote]
I really hate men.
What should I do? A) Beat the piss outta them. B) Talk to them and tell them to step off my woman C) Run and hide like a little girl

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

instead of clogging up what could be a valuable source of reputable information with your stupid comments.

The only way this thread would be useful is if Mopar tripped on his router and the bytes of data containing this thread hit a parallax in the dark matter of the fiber optic cables, creating a wormhole and sucking Mopar back into the early 2000’s, allowing him to buy santa hats for 100k each.

The supposed topic is this thread is what? Relationship advice for the mentally deficient?

Read full topic

[/quote]

Your just jealous because i have “fan-boys”
